Note: For other MSS see 6772; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 2601.
_description: Gospel, ‘In nocte natalis domini’, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Waa and wandrethe wackyns wydeþat come of couetise &
                    pride…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…And in erthe to men be peesþat in right lufe & gude
                    will es

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Wa and wandreth wawes wydeThat commes of couatys and of
                    pride…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…And als in erth to man be peesThat in right treuth & gud
                    lyue es

Lam260.First Lines:
Wa & wandreth walkys wydþat come of couatyse &
                    pryd…
Lam260.Last Lines:
…& be noght with þire gyleris tane& god sayd
                    meknes attane

EDCPCM.First Lines:
wa and wanderet walkes wideÞat com of covaitis and
                    pride…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…And son quen scho deliuerid wasseScho laid hir son bifor
                    asse…
EDCPCM.Note: Imperfect at end due to lost folio(s)
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Ad missam in nocte natalis domini secundum lucam (f.
                    24rb), and Ad missa in mane secundum lucam (f.
                    24va)

Small,  John,
                        ed.  
             English Metrical Homilies….

                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
